Comment: The real damage will start to show by 200 days. So far, we just have the stock market losses.  The real damage will show when products don’t land on shelves and affect sales. When parts don’t arrive at factories and products don’t get produced.  That will really affect the bottom line and will spike layoffs.
Author: Starrion
